thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: Christopher Eiffert
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by Christopher Eiffert

author: Christopher Eiffert
title: Christopher Eiffert
text:
I wanted to take a moment today to express to you what a big help Allen has been over the last month with my laser / power supply issues on my LS2436.
He's been on top of everything, reaching out to me on my open ticket to ensure that we were working towards a final resolution in a timely manner. As an engineer, previous electronics technician and customer service support specialist, I have been very impressed with how Allen takes on a ticket / issue, researches that issue, and works towards a quick resolution.
Having experienced the great lack of customer service many companies have, I am very pleased and confident with Allen and the Boss Laser technical staff.
Thank you
Christopher Eiffert
LS2436 100W
